DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind , randomize , control , cross-over design 3 test product one control product . To evaluate effect 4 different flour composition ( guar gum 2 % 4 % , chickpea flour 15 % barley flour 2 % 5 % ) select fibre flour , post-prandial plasma ( PPG ) serum insulin level healthy Indian subject , consumption flat bread make 100 gram flour composition .
DOC.brief_title: To Test Effect Selected Fibres Flours Flat Bread Post-Prandial Blood Glucose Insulin Responses Healthy Indian Population
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female subject > 20 < 50 year age BMI > 18 < 23 kg/m2 Fasting blood glucose value volunteer > 3.4 < 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62 110 mg/dl ) screen Chronic smoker , tobacco chewer drinker .
